secrets.name: Secret01
secrets.secretText: Event listener of Javascript can be placed only on an already existing hmtl element.

secrets.name: Secret02
secrets.secretText: The $ character stands for both PHP and JQuery, therefore the forementioned framework doesn't work with PHP.

secrets.name: Secret03
secrets.secretText: Action self for handling forms sounds handy, but not for all cases.

secrets.name: Secret04
secrets.secretText: Round-around like referring from one PHP file to another with include can eat up memory.

secrets.name: Secret05
secrets.secretText: Mark 5 or not mark 5? Just kidding.
